snippet: Defensive tackle Shaun Rogers has a blood clot in his calf that will sideline him for the entire N.F.L. season, which was to be his first with the Giants.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Giants defensive tackle Shaun Rogers will miss the entire NFL season because of a blood clot in his calf; other developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Defensive tackle Shaun Rogers has a blood clot in his calf that will sideline him for the entire N.F.L. season, which was to be his first with the Giants.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Roundup — Giants’ Shaun Rogers Is Out for the Season
headline.main: Giants Defensive Tackle Out for Season With a Clot
headline.print_headline: Giants Defensive Tackle Out for Season With Blood Clot in Calf
